skillTree.name: Lord of the Deeps
skillTree.description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Obstinacy
skillTree.description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

skillTree.name: Oath of Forging
skillTree.description: To fire the forges and bring true craft and artifice back into the world.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +20% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +35% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +50% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mountainstrider
skillTree.description: Grombrindal is never late, nor ever early – he arrives precisely when needed the most.

skillTree.name: Mighty Beard of Defence
skillTree.description: Grombrindal’s lustrous white beard is the envy of many a Dwarf. Such fine whiskers can transfix and befuddle any foe!

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 when defending 
	(Lord's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 when defending 
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mythical Longevity
skillTree.description: It is unclear how Grombrindal came to be, but his long history of appearances suggest he has crossed the bounds of mortality.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5% after winning a battle
Campaign movement range: +10% after winning a battle

skillTree.name: Rouse the Engineers!
skillTree.description: The world changes for the worse; the usual prudence of the Engineers Guild must be tempered! Even they would not deny the White Dwarf!

effects.description:
Ammunition: +25% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and war machine units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +5 for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and War Machine units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and war machine units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +50% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and war machine units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +10 for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and War Machine units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +20% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and war machine units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Grimnir's Resolve
skillTree.description: Grombrindal’s mere presence drives the Dawi to feats that even the grumbliest Longbeard would laud!

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +4 for "Grombrindal has no fear"
Ability number of uses: +4 for "Grombrindal has no fear"

Income: +100% from Mining Camp stance
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Age of Vengeance
skillTree.description: The throng is overtaken with gnollengrom with a fervour not seen since ages past!

skillTree.name: Time of the Ancestors
skillTree.description: It is the Age of Reckoning; the Ancestor Gods must act now for the good of the Karaz Ankor.

effects.description: Turn time: -10 between each passing of the Living Ancestor event

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Resolute
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Grudge
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Venerate Grungni
skillTree.description: Grungni is the Ancestor God of Mining and Stoneworking, and is considered the principal deity of the Dwarf ancestor gods.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

Upkeep: -10% for Miners, Ironbreakers, Dwarf Engineers and Irondrakes units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +100% for Dwarf Miners and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Venerate Valaya
skillTree.description: Valaya is the Ancestor Goddess of Home and Healing, wife of Grungni and Grimnir.

effects.description:
Attrition: -50% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Venerate Grimnir
skillTree.description: Grimnir is the Ancestor God of Warriors, and slayers in particular.

skillTree.name: Venerate Gazul
skillTree.description: Gazul is the Ancestor God of Underearth and the Dwarf protector of the dead. Gazul's cult seeks out and purges the undead wherever its taint is found.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Vampire Counts
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Great Axe and Hammerer Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Venerate Smednir
skillTree.description: Smednir is the Ancestor God of of metalworking and ore refinement, creator of many great magical rune weapons including Ghal Maraz.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Warriors, Longbeards, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Enemy spell resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Venerate Thungni
skillTree.description: Thungni is the Ancestor God of Runesmithing, and brought the secrets of Runic magic to the Dwarf race.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -25% when increasing
	(enemy armies in province)

Upkeep: -10% for Lords and Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Venerate Morgrim
skillTree.description: Morgrim is the Ancestor God of Engineers, developing the first bolt and stone throwers of the Dwarves.

effects.description:
Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local province)

Upkeep: -10% for Artillery, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Axe Lord
skillTree.description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are long-lived with many years of battlefield experience, making them excellent tacticians.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tradition & Innovation
skillTree.description: The Dawi continually push the boundaries of engineering, be it by soaring ever higher in their flying contraptions or firing projectiles farther than ever before.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +5% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fire & Fury
skillTree.description: Only Dwarfen forges burn hotter than those unfortunates caught in the blaze of Dawi ingenuity.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Grimnir's Heirs
skillTree.description: Full of grim determination, when Dwarfs join battle there is no retreat, only victory or death.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Thunderer
skillTree.description: This Lord knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +6% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessed by Grungni
skillTree.description: Those who pass the trials of the Ancestor God have proven their honour without question.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dawi Firepower
skillTree.description: None know the strength of the Dawi better than those who've suffered their firepower firsthand.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Dwarf Engineers, Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Dwarf Engineers, Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Dwarf Engineers, Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honoured by Grimnir
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs worship Grimnir, but only a select few warriors receive his personal recognition.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Morgrim’s Favoured
skillTree.description: Morgrim's favour is not handed out on a whim; this god blesses only the truest disciples of Dawi engineering.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Legendary Commerce
skillTree.description: Once the forges burn, under the protection of a living Ancestor, the Guilds put their folk to work. Riches quickly follow.

skillTree.name: Ancient Acumen
skillTree.description: Few have lived as long as the White Dwarf. Can any Dawi, umgi or even elgi rival such experience?

skillTree.name: Eager Kin
skillTree.description: While all Dwarfs are relentless in their goals – never slowing or slouching – Grombrindal’s determination is on another level altogether.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(all armies factionwide)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(all armies factionwide)

Recruitment cost: -15% for all units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Absolutely Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

skillTree.name: Get Up!
skillTree.description: You some kind of bearded Elf or a true Dawi? That’s just a scratch, get up!”

skillTree.name: The White Dwarf’s Call
skillTree.description: When Grombrindal musters the throngs, Dawi from leagues around will come to honour and fight for the living Ancestor.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

backgroundSkills.name: White Dwarf
backgroundSkills.description: "You and your followers will die - that is my oath as my kin, Grimnir, is witness!"

effects.description:
Melee defence: +10 for Dwarf Engineers, Quarrellers and Irondrakes units
	(Lord's army)

items.name: Armour of Glimril Scales
items.description: Replicated by Runesmiths from a single scale wedged between the teeth of a slain Chaos Lord at the pivotal Battle of Thraag, the White Dwarf's armour is able to deflect even the hardest blows.

items.name: Rune Axe of Grombrindal
items.description: Mentioned in several sagas and legends, could the White Dwarf's mighty weapon be the fabled rune axe wielded by Grimnir at the dawn of history?

items.name: Cloak of Valaya
items.description: Grombrindal's cloak was woven by Valaya herself as a token of the love she felt for the White Dwarf, as proven by the skill in needlework displayed.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +25%

items.name: Rune Helm of Zhufbar
items.description: Long thought lost to time and conflict, Grombrindal's awesome helm inspires already-courageous Dwarfen hearts to even greater acts of bravery.

factionEffects.title: Legendary Warrior
factionEffects.description: Grombrindal, The White Dwarf, is a legendary figure - the mightiest living Dawi warrior.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +100% when fighting against Elves
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +50%
Can call upon the power of the Ancestor Gods
Diplomatic relations: -100 with Dark Elves, High Elves and Wood Elves
Grombrindal will aid his kin in every defence battle (when not present in same province)
